mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visit (member_id, hospital_name, department, visit_date, memo, cost) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{hospital_name}, #{department}, #{visit_date}, #{memo}, #{cost});
mapper.update: UPDATE visit SET hospital_name = #{hospital_name}, department = #{department}, visit_date = #{visit_date}, memo = #{memo}, cost = #{cost} WHERE visit_id = #{visit_id};
